$unit?=m{$unitstr1=minutê $unitstr2=minuty $unitstr=minut }{} $unit?=h{$unitstr1=godzinê $unitstr2=godziny $unitstr=godzin }{} $unit?=d{$unitstr1=dzieñ $unitstr2=dni $unitstr=dni }{} $unit?=w{$unitstr1=tydzieñ $unitstr2=tygodnie $unitstr=tygodni }{} $unit?=M{$unitstr1=miesi±c $unitstr2=miesi±ce $unitstr=miesiêcy}{} $time?=1{$unitstr=$unitstr1}{} $time?=2{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=3{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=4{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=22{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=23{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=24{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=32{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=33{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=34{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=42{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=43{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=44{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=52{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=53{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $time?=54{$unitstr=$unitstr2}{} $encurl=%encode[url] Useful WWWOFFLE Buttons $Delete = http://$localhost/control/delete-url/?url=$encurl $Refresh = http://$localhost/refresh/?$encurl $Options = http://$localhost/refresh-options/?$encurl $Monitor = http://$localhost/monitor-options/?$encurl $Index = http://$localhost/index/url/?$encurl $Config = http://$localhost/configuration/url?url=$encurl -->
